statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} - x + 2 , -9 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} - x + 12 , -6 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 3 , 16 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 11 \, x - 3 , x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - x - 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
